name: Alchemy (itch)
description:
This potion shop needs to pay its rent on time, and it's up to you, the lowly potions apprentice, to make it happen. Collect ingredients in the suspiciously deep and layered basement, combine ingredients to brew unknown potions, and throw magic at needy townsfolk for cash.  You only have ten days, so you'd better get brewing!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Dash

Left mouse button - Attack

E - Interact

Q - Drink Potion

Right mouse button - Throw Potion

R - Recall from Basement

Tab - Open Inventory/Close Menus

1-4 - Select Potion
